metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14697 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
musl libc through 1.1.23 has an x87 floating-point stack adjustment imbalance, related to the math/i386/ directory. In some cases, use of this library could introduce out-of-bounds writes that are not present in an application's source code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

musl - 1.1.19-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
musl-tools - 1.1.19-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: musl package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.19-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
